metadata.description: Browse discounted goods from Samara listed on the DNS website. Track price changes, store availability, and receive email notifications for your favorite items.
metadata.keywords: DNS, discounted goods, price tracking, favorites, email notifications, price analysis, Samara

HomePage.title: DNS Markdown
HomePage.text:
<lead>This is an unofficial DNS fan site designed to help you browse discounted goods from the city of Samara.</lead> 

This service allows you to add items to your favorites to track updates such as price changes or store availability.

One of the main features of the site is price analysis. For each item, a snapshot of price/benefit/original price is created and presented to the user in a convenient graph format. Price analysis clearly shows when your desired item has dropped in price and is worth purchasing. 

 The service allows you to receive email notifications for selected products. Emails will be sent when the price of these products changes or someone buys them. 

**The service is completely free and does not require mandatory registration.**
